trends: There have been no other sightings in Otley
This sighting has been favorited 2 times.
Summary: dome with ascending lights then small flashes
divs: Sighting DetailsI was stood by the back door to my garden, it was thick white cloud, yet this dome shape bright light flashed, the next to it was a row of ascending lights, then flashes like little stars all around. By the time my Husband got the camera it had stopped, but I can provide a sketch if needed.
